title: "Meta Doubles Down on Direct Speech-to-Speech Translation"
excerpt: "Meta (fka Facebook) published a post about a “direct speech-to-speech translation (S2ST) approach.” Direct S2ST eliminates the text-generation step in spoken language conversion, thus including languages without writing systems."
